Detailed Description

A "complex" frame class.

A "complex" skinned frame that behaves like a normal frame.

SetMaximizeBoxRelation

Member Function Documentation

void wxSkinFrame::SetCloseBoxRelation ( int  rel = RELATE_ABSOLUTE  )  [inline]

Set the relation for the closebox. RELATE_ABSOLUTE means the closebox doesn't move, RELATE_TOP means that it will be moved when the top border changes in size.
